metadata.title: CVE-2011-3761 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: NuSOAP 0.9.5 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a direct request to a .php file, which reveals the installation path in an error message, as demonstrated by nuSOAP/classes/class.wsdl.php and certain other files.

criterions.comment: nusoap package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
